1437300.name: Emberheart Demo
1437300.description:
Emberheart is an Isometric ARPG in the likes of Diablo, Torchlight and Grim Dawn!

Demo limitations/features:
- Only the Berserker class is available.
- Maximum level of 40 instead of 70
- First Act of playable content (full early access release contains exploration zones for more acts)
- 2 out of 4 brackets of unique legendary items can be collected in the collection panel.
- Pre-end-game and End-game systems are disabled in the Demo. (Hog level, Arena, Gem Hunt, Uber Bosses)
- Contains full access to passive skill tree (but limited points can be spent due to max level limitation)
